quote.text: The groundwork of all happiness is health.
quote.author: Leigh Hunt

workout.name: Morning Jog
workout.description: Start your day with a refreshing morning jog. Maintain a steady pace.

workout.name: Push-ups
workout.description: Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels. Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor.

workout.name: Jumping Jacks
workout.description: Stand upright with your legs together, arms at your sides. Jump while spreading your arms and legs. Return to starting position.

workout.name: Yoga Stretch
workout.description: Perform various yoga stretches to improve your flexibility. Include poses such as the downward dog, warrior pose, and tree pose.

workout.name: Squats
workout.description: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Lower your body as far as you can by pushing your hips back and bending your knees. Slowly push back to the starting position.

workout.name: Crunches
workout.description: Lie down on your back. Bend your legs and place feet firmly on the ground. Place your hands behind your head and lift your upper body off the floor. Slowly get back down.

workout.name: Evening Walk
workout.description: End your day with a leisurely walk. Maintain a relaxed pace.

breakfast.name: Oatmeal with Fruits
breakfast.description: A healthy mix of oats and fruits to kickstart your day.
instructions: Simmer for 10 minutes until oats are cooked.
Slice apple and banana and add to the cooked oats along with blueberries.

lunch.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
lunch.description: A protein-packed salad with fresh veggies and grilled chicken.
instructions: Grill the chicken breast until fully cooked.
Slice lettuce, tomato, cucumber, and carrot.
Slice cooked chicken and add to the salad.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper before serving.

dinner.name: Quinoa and Mixed Veggies
dinner.description: A filling and nutritious meal with quinoa and a mix of colorful vegetables.
instructions: Simmer for 15 minutes until quinoa is cooked.
Chop bell pepper, onion, zucchini, and carrot.
Saute vegetables in olive oil until tender.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.
